page.title: 18Village life (Survey).
page.content: We made a survey to find out how people felt about living in the area. We asked three questions. {1. What do you like most about the {village that you live in?} 37% said Peace and Quiet. 30% said The Cottages and Scenery. 17% said Nearness to town but in the country. 16% said The Friendly Atmosphere. {2. What would you change or improve {about the village?} 52% said They would change nothing. 24% said Improve Road Signs. 16% said A tidier Village. 4% said More parking. 4% said More Play Areas. {3. Have you moved into the village or {are you a local person? } 60% were local people. The rest were from many parts of England and some were from Europe.
